topic.title: Why do we need Tor on ZeroNet
topic.body: Basically, I am new to this. Is there a reason I should choose Tor? Currently im just using a VPN.

1573754537_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5B.body:

She wont win against WarBern and isnt seeking another term in congress. Vote for her cause our system is broke, but she will fade to the history of time
